Firm Arrowhead.Name: Firm Arrowhead
Firm Arrowhead.Description: A roughly produced arrowhead. Though unimpressive, neither it nor the bow should be underestimated, for even the bravest knight can be felled by an arrow from the rear.

Teachings of Freedom.Name: Teachings of Freedom
Teachings of Freedom.Description: Freedom is the spirit of the Land of the Wind.The freedom to live is one of such. It is the freedom to live freely and healthily without concerns of one's own safety.

Sharp Arrowhead.Name: Sharp Arrowhead
Sharp Arrowhead.Description: A well-made arrowhead. Sharp enough to penetrate armor with the ease of a rock through the surface of water.

Guide to Freedom.Name: Guide to Freedom
Guide to Freedom.Description: Freedom is the spirit of the Land of the Wind.The freedom of travel is one of such. It is the freedom to traverse the land freely without being obstructed.

Weathered Arrowhead.Name: Weathered Arrowhead
Weathered Arrowhead.Description: An old arrowhead coated in blood. The arrowhead has long since lost its sharpness and thus its use as a weapon.However it represents the pride of a hunter and acts as both an amulet and a medal.

Philosophies of Freedom.Name: Philosophies of Freedom
Philosophies of Freedom.Description: Freedom is the spirit of the city of wind.To sing is one such freedom. To sing on the land created by the Anemo Archon is to send your heart away with the song on the wind.

Dvalin's Sigh.Name: Dvalin's Sigh
Dvalin's Sigh.Description: A bit of power taken from the whirlwinds evoked by the Dragon of the East.Beautiful and transparent, both trade winds and tornadoes will work in its name. The winds moves as its companion, its voice, and its freedom.Its enemies are the thousands who stand against the wind.

Crown of Sagehood.Name: Crown of Sagehood
Crown of Sagehood.Description: Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Sagehood must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

Agnidus Agate Sliver.Name: Agnidus Agate Sliver
How to Obtain: Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

Small Lamp Grass.Name: Small Lamp Grass
Small Lamp Grass.Description: A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.
How to Obtain: Found in the wild at night

Agnidus Agate Fragment.Name: Agnidus Agate Fragment
Agnidus Agate Fragment.Description: "A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."
How to Obtain: Lv.40+ Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

Everflame Seed.Name: Everflame Seed
Everflame Seed.Description: A seed that fuels the unending flames of the Pyro Regisvine. It emits pyro energy as if it will burn all that has ever sprouted from the ground.Endless desires flow among turbulent energy deep within the earth. What desire could steadily hold such fire to the plants and long so eagerly to bathe everything in unquenchable flames?

Agnidus Agate Chunk.Name: Agnidus Agate Chunk
Agnidus Agate Chunk.Description: "A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name…" Burnt to cinders for a dream."
How to Obtain: Lv. 60+ Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

Agnidus Agate Gemstone.Name: Agnidus Agate Gemstone
Agnidus Agate Gemstone.Description: "A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..." "Burnt to cinders for a dream." "If the intention yet remains, achieved —'s truth he has."
How to Obtain: Lv. 75+ Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

Divining Scroll.Name: Divining Scroll
Divining Scroll.Description: A scroll that likely relates to some kind of magic. Exudes an inexplicable but ominous warmth.

Sealed Scroll.Name: Sealed Scroll
Sealed Scroll.Description: An old scroll lacking in detail and clarity. By following the images on it, some magical creatures can recreate a small part of its magic.

Forbidden Curse Scroll.Name: Forbidden Curse Scroll
Forbidden Curse Scroll.Description: A scroll inscribed with ancient images. It is said that few can decipher its meaning, and the few scholars that have all went mad.

Ring of Boreas.Name: Ring of Boreas
Ring of Boreas.Description: A bit of crystallized ice from the Great Wolf King of the North.This land was once a realm of sub-zero blizzards and ice storms filled with razor-sharp ice shards, all at the command of Boreas. Though its powers may have diminished, flash-freezing the land is still a breeze.
How to Obtain: Lv. 70+ Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

Philanemo Mushroom.Name: Philanemo Mushroom
Philanemo Mushroom.Description: A fungus that grows in the warm caress of the wind. It is as everlasting as the wind, nourishing life.
How to Obtain: Found under the eaves of houses

Cleansing Heart.Name: Cleansing Heart
Cleansing Heart.Description: A scoop of eternal water left by an oceanid.Though it has already diffused among the depths of the lake, its purity remains all the same. But why would a creature so pure and clean as an oceanid desire the appearance of plants born of the ground and assume such a form with pure water? They need not breathe nor do they require sustenance...

Varunada Lazurite Chunk.Name: Varunada Lazurite Chunk
Varunada Lazurite Chunk.Description: "My ideals have no stains.I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods..."

Varunada Lazurite Gemstone.Name: Varunada Lazurite Gemstone
Varunada Lazurite Gemstone.Description: "My ideals have no stains.I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods… Only laws and the Tribunal can judge someone.They can judge even me. So praise my magnificence and purity."

Treasure Hoarder Insignia.Name: Treasure Hoarder Insignia
Treasure Hoarder Insignia.Description: A signet that proudly represents it's owner's position as a member of the Treasure Hoarders. The pursuit of treasure knows no bounds. That said... is being a thief something to be proud of?

Teachings of Gold.Name: Teachings of Gold
Teachings of Gold.Description: Gold is the symbol of the Land of the Earth.Gold is the blood flowing deep under the land of Liyue, is the muscles that pump Liyue's heart, and the bones that make Liyue stand proud.

Silver Raven Insignia.Name: Silver Raven Insignia
Silver Raven Insignia.Description: A raven insignia used by members of the Treasure Hoarders to identify each other. The Treasure Hoarders ask for no resume. Anyone who has an insatiable desire for treasure and is backed up by an equal amount of courage can become a worthy member.

Guide to Gold.Name: Guide to Gold
Guide to Gold.Description: Gold is the symbol of the Land of the Earth.Gold symbolizes conversion. This is the unspoken understanding between Liyue's mountains, land, city, and its people. In Liyue, industriousness is converted to gold, and gold to prosperity.

Golden Raven Insignia.Name: Golden Raven Insignia
Golden Raven Insignia.Description: A raven insignia that symbolizes the pride and the guiding principle of the Treasure Hoarders. Whether it's hidden amidst the vastness of the land or in the depths of the seas, as long as there are treasures to be hunted down, the spirit of Treasure Hoarders, who will stop at nothing to acquire them, will never die.

Philosophies of Gold.Name: Philosophies of Gold
Philosophies of Gold.Description: Gold is the symbol of the Land of the Earth.Gold is the wealth of Liyue, but Liyue's true wealth is the hearts of its people that shine like gold.

Noctilucous Jade.Name: Noctilucous Jade
Noctilucous Jade.Description: A rare mineral that glimmers in the dark. It's said to be a mutated gemstone condensed from the flourishing elements of the world.

Vajrada Amethyst Fragment.Name: Vajrada Amethyst Fragment
Vajrada Amethyst Fragment.Description: "This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."

Lightning Prism.Name: Lightning Prism
Lightning Prism.Description: An Electro Hypostasis channels nearby elemental energy to repair damaged elemental entities. It contains the essence of Electro energy. A common prism separates white light into component colors; a Lightning Prism, however, channels flowing energy and weaves them into lighting. It will continue to do so even after the Electro Hypostasis has been defeated.

Vajrada Amethyst Chunk.Name: Vajrada Amethyst Chunk
Vajrada Amethyst Chunk.Description: "This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.It should hold absolute control over this world."

Vajrada Amethyst Gemstone.Name: Vajrada Amethyst Gemstone
Vajrada Amethyst Gemstone.Description: "This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."It should hold absolute control over this world."It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"

Teachings of Resistance.Name: Teachings of Resistance
Teachings of Resistance.Description: Resistance is the backbone of the Land of the Wind.The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to prevent past conflicts from ever being forgotten, like sprouts breaking through the soil, like the eternal wind eroding through stone walls.

Guide to Resistance.Name: Guide to Resistance
Guide to Resistance.Description: Resistance is the backbone of the city of Wind.The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to grant the citizens of Mondstadt the freedom they now enjoy, like the Anemo Archon blowing away the snow, or like Vennessa rising up to fight.

Philosophies of Resistance.Name: Philosophies of Resistance
Philosophies of Resistance.Description: Resistance is the backbone of the Land of the Wind.The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to allow the future Mondstadt's poetry to freely be that of the wind and be spread across the land.

Dvalin's Plume.Name: Dvalin's Plume
Dvalin's Plume.Description: A feather from the tail of the Dragon of the East.As a dragon's feather it has experienced more than a thousand years' worth of winds. Its ambition to be free almost evokes light breezes to break it off its current shackles, but its previous owner's recognition of you has kept it in your hands.

Windwheel Aster.Name: Windwheel Aster
Windwheel Aster.Description: A plant that adores the wind. To the proud children of the wind, or the citizens of Mondstadt, the Windwheel Asters are the "visible winds."
How to Obtain: Found near the Statue of The Seven at Windrise
Found under trees in the wild

Damaged Mask.Name: Damaged Mask
Damaged Mask.Description: A broken bone mask that once belonged to some hilichurl.Now more broken than complete, it can no longer perform its primary function.

Teachings of Diligence.Name: Teachings of Diligence
Teachings of Diligence.Description: Industriousness is the foundation of the Land of the Earth.Diligence is to conquer mountains and seas, pursue prosperity, golden bravery, and power with honest, hard work.

Stained Mask.Name: Stained Mask
Stained Mask.Description: A bone mask covered in unidentifiable stains and a mysterious odor.Yet such is the devotion of hilichurls to masks that they will wear it nonetheless.
How to Obtain: Dropped by some Lv.40+ ranged hilichurls

Guide to Diligence.Name: Guide to Diligence
Guide to Diligence.Description: Industriousness is the foundation of the Land of the Earth.Industriousness is the catalyst the flows in the blood of the people of Liyue, able to turn rocks into gold.It is what makes its great commercial port great.

Ominous Mask.Name: Ominous Mask
Ominous Mask.Description: A glossy bone mask with oil markings painted on it, meant to intimidate enemies.No-one really knows why hilichurls are so fascinated with masks. Some say it's because they don't want to see their own reflections in the water.
How to Obtain: Dropped by some Lv. 60+ ranged hilichurls

Philosophies of Diligence.Name: Philosophies of Diligence
Philosophies of Diligence.Description: Industriousness is the foundation of the land of the earth.Industriousness is believing in one's own ability to earn a place in the land of the gods through sweat, wisdom, and power.

Shivada Jade Sliver.Name: Shivada Jade Sliver
How to Obtain: Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

Cor Lapis.Name: Cor Lapis
Cor Lapis.Description: A precious crystal of condensed pure Geo element that usually grows along with other minerals. It's also commonly called "Cor Petrae."

Shivada Jade Fragment.Name: Shivada Jade Fragment
How to Obtain: Lv. 40+ Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

Hoarfrost Core.Name: Hoarfrost Core
Hoarfrost Core.Description: The exposed core of a defeated Cryo Regisvine. Pure cryo elements are contained within it. Energy and thoughts that swell deep within the earth will eventually erupt on the surface. Even the deathly silent frost will attach to creatures on the ground, causing even the vines and branches of vegetation to become huge and fierce, attracting the hunter's gaze.

Shivada Jade Chunk.Name: Shivada Jade Chunk
Shivada Jade Chunk.Description: "Sorry...""...to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world."
How to Obtain: Lv. 60+ Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

Shivada Jade Gemstone.Name: Shivada Jade Gemstone
Shivada Jade Gemstone.Description: "Sorry… to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world."Since you could endure my bitter cold, you must have the desire to burn?"Then, burn away the old world for me."
How to Obtain: Lv. 75+ Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

Recruit's Insignia.Name: Recruit's Insignia
Recruit's Insignia.Description: An insignia to identify the recruits. Makes one wonder about what the ones joining the Fatui's war machine were thinking.
How to Obtain: Dropped by some Electro Cicin Mages

Sergeant's Insignia.Name: Sergeant's Insignia
Sergeant's Insignia.Description: An insignia with a different shape to tell the sergeants from new recruits. Perhaps there are complicated emotions behind it.
How to Obtain: Dropped by some Lvl.40+ Fatui Electro Cicin Mages

Lieutenant's Insignia.Name: Lieutenant's Insignia
Lieutenant's Insignia.Description: An armband to identify officers. The Fatui possess a colossal army, so there must be something extraordinary about the ones who achieved this rank within the group.
How to Obtain: Dropped by some Lv. 60+ Electro Cicin Mages

Shard of a Foul Legacy.Name: Shard of a Foul Legacy
Shard of a Foul Legacy.Description: The shard of a weapon that you obtained from defeating Childe, who had unleashed the might of his Delusion.It is stained with a profound color that is not of this world, no doubt due to the land of endless darkness that the young boy saw with his own two eyes.Perhaps it has nothing to do with the power of a Delusion, but as they say, the weapon reflects its user...

Calla Lily.Name: Calla Lily
Calla Lily.Description: A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.

Teachings of Ballad.Name: Teachings of Ballad
Teachings of Ballad.Description: Poetry is the soul of the Land of the Wind.Poetry is the manifestations of beautiful feelings. On a beautiful day, the breezes carry with them poetry that touches the heart of people like the wind caressing the leaves.

Guide to Ballad.Name: Guide to Ballad
Guide to Ballad.Description: Poetry is the soul of the Land of the Wind.Poetry is the manifestations of the will to encourage. In the dark days, the gales in the streets and alleyways whisper words of fury, like the battle drums, like the low rumbling before the storm.

Philosophies of Ballad.Name: Philosophies of Ballad
Philosophies of Ballad.Description: Poetry is the soul of the Land of the Wind.Poetry is the manifestations of the desire to spread the word. Though nothing is eternal, though nothing will be the same, the wind's poetry will still spread beyond the skies, the land, the seas, to every corner of the world.

Spirit Locket of Boreas.Name: Spirit Locket of Boreas
Spirit Locket of Boreas.Description: A bit of the Great Wolf King of the North's power drawn from its soul. This land was once a realm of sub-zero blizzards and ice storms filled with razor-sharp ice shards, all at the command of Boreas. In its final moments, it finally realized the chilling north wind could only extinguish life, not nurture it; therefore, Boreas let its powers freely flow into the land to protect it and its inhabitants.
How to Obtain: Lv. 70+ Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

Dandelion Seed.Name: Dandelion Seed
Dandelion Seed.Description: A tiny seed that rides on the wind. Even without its feathered wings, it still holds the hope from afar within.

Hurricane Seed.Name: Hurricane Seed
Hurricane Seed.Description: The imploded form of an Anemo Hypostasis upon its defeat. It contains the essence of Anemo energy. It is said that the power to create hurricanes resides within its seemingly fragile body. This butterfly of pure Anemo energy must be waiting for the day to conjure up storms once again.

Vayuda Turquoise Chunk.Name: Vayuda Turquoise Chunk
Vayuda Turquoise Chunk.Description: "Still, the winds change direction.Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future…"

Vayuda Turquoise Gemstone.Name: Vayuda Turquoise Gemstone
Vayuda Turquoise Gemstone.Description: "Still, the winds change direction."Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future…"Take my blessings and live leisurely from this day onward."

Whopperflower Nectar.Name: Whopperflower Nectar
Whopperflower Nectar.Description: Nectar extracted from the stamen of a Whopperflower that contains trace amounts of elements. The taste of the nectar has a hint of Sweet Flower in it.

Teachings of Prosperity.Name: Teachings of Prosperity
Teachings of Prosperity.Description: Prosperity is the pursuit of the land of the earth. Prosperity is the blessing of Liyue, is the great city built by the gods and the people of Liyue, is the source of the peace and safety of the land.

Shimmering Nectar.Name: Shimmering Nectar
Shimmering Nectar.Description: Nectar that is full of pure elements.Scholars generally concur that Whopperflowers are advanced life forms among the elemental plants, but there has yet to be a satisfactory explanation regarding their predatory habits.

Guide to Prosperity.Name: Guide to Prosperity
Guide to Prosperity.Description: Prosperity is the pursuit of the Land of the Earth. Prosperity is the promise made by Liyue to its children: To repay the hard-working laborers with enough gold to brighten up this land.

Energy Nectar.Name: Energy Nectar
Energy Nectar.Description: A thick and sticky honey that is full of energy. The Whopperflower hunts by tricking its prey, a process it uses to possibly evolve into a more powerful and pure form.

Philosophies of Prosperity.Name: Philosophies of Prosperity
Philosophies of Prosperity.Description: Properity is the pursuit of the Land of the Earth. Prosperity is Liyue's past, present, and future. This prosperity, unmatched and unobtainable by any of the other nations, is all for Liyue and its children to enjoy.

Slime Condensate.Name: Slime Condensate
Slime Condensate.Description: A thick coating found on slimes. Most commonly seen material in elemental workshops.

Slime Secretions.Name: Slime Secretions
Slime Secretions.Description: Mildly purified slime secretions. Harmful to the skin. Please avoid direct exposure.

Slime Concentrate.Name: Slime Concentrate
Slime Concentrate.Description: Concentrated slime essence. When left on its own, it will begin to move on its own.

Dvalin's Claw.Name: Dvalin's Claw
Dvalin's Claw.Description: A claw from the Dragon of the East.As it had once torn through the flesh of the shadow dragon Durin, it used to contain his vicious poison. However, thanks to your purification and healing, it is no longer toxic.

Valberry.Name: Valberry
Valberry.Description: A plump and translucent berry that has a fragrant smell and a sweet refreshing taste. In the past, the watchers of the storms found solace in the sweetness of the fruit and the hope for the city's security.
How to Obtain: Found in the wild around Stormbearer Mountains

Prithiva Topaz Sliver.Name: Prithiva Topaz Sliver
How to Obtain: Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

Glaze Lily.Name: Glaze Lily
Glaze Lily.Description: An extremely ancient flower that was said to be commonly seen in Liyue. It transforms the memories of the land into its fragrance during florescence.
How to Obtain: Found in Yujing Terrace, Liyue Harbor

Prithiva Topaz Fragment.Name: Prithiva Topaz Fragment
Prithiva Topaz Fragment.Description: "The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood."
How to Obtain: Lv.40+ Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

Basalt Pillar.Name: Basalt Pillar
Basalt Pillar.Description: A pillar form by the shell of a Geo Hypostasis. It is composed of high-density Geo energy. This is the heaviest component of a Geo Element. Maybe the reason a Geo Hypostasis creates this polar out of its shell and raises itself is just to get closer to the sky, not to combat enemies.

Prithiva Topaz Chunk.Name: Prithiva Topaz Chunk
Prithiva Topaz Chunk.Description: "The currencies on this land are blood."I am the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future."
How to Obtain: Lv. 60+ Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

Prithiva Topaz Gemstone.Name: Prithiva Topaz Gemstone
Prithiva Topaz Gemstone.Description: "The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood."For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future."This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."
How to Obtain: Lv. 75+ Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

Tail of Boreas.Name: Tail of Boreas
Tail of Boreas.Description: A handful of tail scales from the Great Wolf King of the North. Even without its physical body and beyond death, Andrius still possesses extraordinary powers. It took a form comprised of ice and wind to embrace a new challenge, but even such form could not house all of its power. The ice scales that fell during the battle still retain some of its spiritual energy.
How to Obtain: Lv. 70 Wolf of the North Challenge Reward

Violetgrass.Name: Violetgrass
Violetgrass.Description: A small flower with strong vitality. It was said its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

Wolfhook.Name: Wolfhook
Wolfhook.Description: A berry with thorns that often gets attached to a wolf's pelt. When you look at it, you can almost hear the echoing cries of the wolves in the woods.

Starconch.Name: Starconch
Starconch.Description: Empty seashells brought ashore by the tides. Hold it close to your ear, and hear the longing calls of the sea.
How to Obtain: Found on the beaches of Liyue

Cecilia.Name: Cecilia
Cecilia.Description: A beautiful flower with a name that suits its appearance. It only grows where harsh winds blow, and is just as intangible as the true heart of an unbound soul.
How to Obtain: Given by an NPC at the top of Starsnatch Cliff
Given by the nun in front of Mondstadt's cathedral

Jueyun Chili.Name: Jueyun Chili
Jueyun Chili.Description: A spicy plant native to Liyue.Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

Silk Flower.Name: Silk Flower
Silk Flower.Description: A crimson flower that blooms like the rainbow clouds in Liyue. It can be made into silky-smooth fabric.
How to Obtain: Found near Yujing Terrace, Liyue Harbor

Tusk of Monoceros Caeli.Name: Tusk of Monoceros Caeli
Tusk of Monoceros Caeli.Description: The horn of a whale that you obtained from defeating Childe, who had unleashed the might of his Delusion.It is said that the shape of one's constellation determines one's character. The image of a whale cruising across the celestial heights represents a solipsism that seeks to crush and devour all in its path.Embracing this aspect of himself, Childe gleefully summoned one such beast before throwing himself into battle against you.
